hash.after-save:
if @issue.is_demand? if @stories_to_demand.present? && @issue.demand_backlog.nil? @issue.sprint = create_demand_backlog puts "Backlog created" end
if @stories_to_demand.present? @stories_to_demand.each do |story| story.parent = @issue story.sprint = @issue.demand_backlog story.save! end Version.where(id: @versions_in).update_all(status: 'requested') puts "Issue children associated" end
if @stories_out_demand.present? Version.where(id: @versions_out).update_all(status: 'planning') @stories_out_demand.each do |story| story.parent_id = nil story.sprint = @issue.product_backlog story.save! end puts "Issue children disassociated" end end
hash.name: GERCONT_demand_versions
